meanings: Noun 일련의 사건[모험] (또는 그에 대한 보도)

vlive.korean: 잡혀간단 말이죠 이게 뭐라고 사갑니까? You'll get locked up! Why would you buy this? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] Jeong Eun Ji X Rooftop Live - 정은지의 루프탑라이브!
vlive.english: You'll get locked up! Why would you buy this?

vlive.korean: 사가초면은 좀... "Sagachomyun" is a bit... 듣기 View video 모비딕(Mobidic) : 연예인들의 악플 대처법 <세젤퀴> 3회
대파? 갑분대? 갑자기 대파를 사 가? Spring onion? Why? Suddenly? 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 굿나잇
[사가초면 X - 사면초가 O] [너덜 너덜] 자가최면은 있어도 사가초면... [Sagichomyun (X) -> Samyunchoga (O)] There is "jagachwemyun", but "sagachomyun"... 듣기 View video 모비딕(Mobidic) : 연예인들의 악플 대처법 <세젤퀴> 3회
"대전에서 서울 올라갈 때 튀김 소보루빵 꼭 사가요" - 그건 뭐예요? "You should get fried soboro bread from Daejeon". - What is that? 듣기 View video NCT : 두근두근첫사인회💚
vlive.english: "You should get fried soboro bread from Daejeon". - What is that?

examples.korean: UB's being awarded the project was disheartening news. 듣기 Add to Wordbook UB 사가 프로젝트를 낙찰받았다는 것은 실망스러운 소식이었습니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: UB's being awarded the project was disheartening news. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Can you give me your opinion about the samples sent by Carpet USA? 듣기 Add to Wordbook Carpet USA 사가 보내온 샘플에 대해 의견을 주시겠습니까? DARAKWON
examples.english: Can you give me your opinion about the samples sent by Carpet USA? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We are still waiting for EZ Computers to resolve the shipping problem. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 저희는 아직도 EZ Computers 사가 운송 문제를 해결하기를 기다리고 있습니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: We are still waiting for EZ Computers to resolve the shipping problem. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I was pleased to learn that TBK Inc. has moved into a new headquarters building. 듣기 Add to Wordbook TBK 사가 새 본사 건물로 이전하게 된 것을 알고 기뻤습니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: I was pleased to learn that TBK Inc. has moved into a new headquarters building. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I am confident ABC will continue its growth and prosperity in the coming years. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 앞으로도 ABC 사가 지속적으로 성장하고 번영할 것을 확신합니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: I am confident ABC will continue its growth and prosperity in the coming years. Add to Wordbook
